entries.name: Potion of Luck
entries.description:
A potion that may make your chances of getting something good a little higher.

FUN FACT: Did you know that 80% of people who gamble quit right before they're about to hit it big?

entries.name: Potion of Unluck
entries.description: You might not want to drink this, however it might be fun to trick a friend into trying.

entries.name: Potion of Nausea
entries.description: A potion that makes you feel sick. It's not very fun, but maybe it's a good way to get rid of unwanted guests.

entries.name: Pet Summoner
entries.description: Summons you a pet... but at what cost...

entries.name: /dev/null
entries.description:
A miraculous innovation in technology! Leveraging a miniature black hole, this handy item can store any amount of an item you put into it. You can even place blocks that are held from within!

Note: this device is somewhat unstable, and removing more than one item from it at once will cause the hole to collapse, ejecting all of your items onto the floor.

entries.name: Bag of Coins
entries.description: Tired of loose change in your pocket? Want an easier way to store your precious money? The Bag of Coins can help with that, providing a way to store all of your CunkCoinâ„¢ without wasting your precious inventory space! It also makes it easier to share coins with someone else -- just throw them in a bag! You can also put the bag in a dispenser and all of the coins will shoot out at once!
